title: Talks Machina: Discussing C1E99 - Masquerade
description: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Sam Riegel, Laura Bailey, and Ashley Johnson to discuss the 99th episode of Critical Role! The four discuss Scanlan's controversial return, give away prizes, and flip the tables during the After Dark segment where Sam takes over as host.
